revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Ammo | name = Ammo satchel | class = AmmoSatchel | game = Strife | doomednum = 183 | spawnid = 144 | spawnname = T_BACKPACK | convid = 187, 181, 184 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:BackpackItem|BackpackItem]]→AmmoSatchel
The ammo satchel contains a sample of each ammunition type (the quantity of which depends on the ammunition, not on the backpack) and extends the carrying capacity of each ammunition type (again, this is a factor of the ammunition). ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR AmmoSatchel : {{Class|BackpackItem}} { +{{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "I_BKPK" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_AMMOSATCHEL" // "Ammo Satchel" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_AMMOSATCHEL" // "You picked up the ammo satchel." States { Spawn: BKPK A -1 Stop } }
